Name: Smarca4-deficient sarcoma of thorax
Definition: A thoracic cancer that is characterized by poorly differentiated neoplasms with epithelioid/rhabdoid cells organized in a solid pattern and has_material_basis_in alterations in the switch/sucrose nonfermenting complex

Name: breast cancer
Definition: A thoracic cancer that originates in the mammary gland.

Name: mediastinal cancer
Definition: A thoracic cancer that is located_in the mediastinum.

Name: chest wall lymphoma
Definition: A thoracic cancer that is located_in the chest wall.
